document.full_text: a bomb targeting worshippers at a mosque killed at least five people and injured 30 in tikrit, north of the capital baghdad on friday, local police said.
document.title: bomb in iraqi city of tikrit kills at least five: police
lines_and_colors: a bomb targeting worshippers at a mosque killed at least five people and injured 30 in tikrit, north of the capital baghdad on friday, local police said.
